comments.content: Ha, I was gonna say, "What sort of ID is that!?" then I saw that Arial is pretty close.

Looks like [Arial Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101024856/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/arial/sfmt-bold-italic/testdrive.html?s=ceelox&p=72), Meta-ized lc "l" and   
arrow-ized "o".
